items.question: What types of images can I create?
items.answer: You can generate a wide range of images from product visuals to artistic illustrations, making it suitable for various applications including marketing, social media, and personal projects.

items.question: Can I customize the style of the images?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can choose from various styles and artistic themes, tailoring the output to fit your specific vision.

items.question: How does the AI understand my text prompts?
items.answer: Our AI leverages advanced natural language processing to interpret your descriptions, translating them into unique visual outputs that match your intent.

items.question: What file formats can I download my images in?
items.answer: Images can be downloaded in multiple formats such as JPG, PNG, and others for versatility in use across platforms.

items.question: Do I have commercial rights for the generated images?
items.answer: Yes, all generated images come with commercial usage rights, allowing you to use them freely for your projects without additional licensing fees.

items.question: Is there a limit to the number of images I can generate?
items.answer: There are no limits on image generation! You can create as many images as you need, making sure you have access to endless creative options.

items.question: Can I enhance the images after generation?
items.answer: Yes, you can further refine the images using various editing tools and features available within our platform.

items.question: What pricing structure do you offer for image generation?
items.answer: We offer flexible pay-as-you-go pricing with no subscriptions required. You only pay for the images you generate, ensuring cost-efficiency.

items.question: How quickly can I expect my images to be generated?
items.answer: Image generation typically takes seconds, allowing for rapid prototyping and creative exploration.

items.question: What support resources do you provide for troubleshooting?
items.answer: We offer extensive documentation, tutorials, and a supportive community to assist you with any questions or technical issues.
